description:
* Based on Part 5, called Vento Aureo, of the JoJo`s Bizarre Adventure manga series by http://anidb.net/cr981 [Araki Hirohiko]. The arc spanned 17 volumes total and was serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump from November 1995 to April 1999.
Teenager http://anidb.net/ch96495 [Giorno] is a small-time thief, but that doesn`t mean he doesn`t have hopes and dreams! In fact, his aspirations are grand: to overthrow the head of a powerful mafia called Passione so he can finally help the people of Naples.
Before he can set his sights on the boss, though, he has to worry about his petty minions - like Leaky-eye Luca, who appears before Giorno to demand protection money for operating in the territory of Passione. A decisive battle between the two ends with Leaky-eye Luca in a coma, but also with Giorno fated for assassination.
Luckily for him, the assassin is a mafia member named http://anidb.net/ch96498 [Bruno] who also has a desire to change how they do business in the city. In the end, Bruno agrees to help Giorno infiltrate the gang by inviting him as a member of Passione. Now, Giorno, Bruno, and the other members of their group must rise through the ranks so they can get in with the boss, take him out for good, and help the city in a way only gangsters can.
Source: Tokyo Otaku Mode
Note: The first episode received a screening at a special event held at Italian Cultural Center`s Anyerri Hall in Tokyo and Japan Expo in Paris on 05.07.2018, and it was later screened at Anime Expo in LA on 07.07.2018.

REGULAR.description:
Naples, Italy. It`s an absolutely beautiful city but it`s overrun with gangs. Koichi Hirose travels to Naples in order to find the possible son of DIO, Haruno Shiobana. Once he arrives, he meets a young man named Giorno Giovanna who ends up stealing his luggage. Koichi discovers that not only is Giorno Haruno Shiobana, but he`s also a Stand user. Meanwhile, Giorno runs into some trouble with a gang member named Leaky Eye Luca, which later gets him into trouble with another gang member named Bruno Bucciarati...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黄金体験(ゴールド・エクスペリエンス)

REGULAR.description:
Bucciarati is looking for the person responsible for critically injuring Leaky Eye Luca and attacks Giorno with his Stand Zipperman. Giorno uses his own Stand named Golden Wind to retaliate. During this fight, Giorno learns that Golden Wind not only has the ability to give objects life but he also learns that it can also make his opponent`s sense go berserk.
Source: crunchyroll

Bucciarati accepts Giorno`s resolve to join Passione and has him take the test to get into the gang. The one giving the test is one of Passione`s capos, Polpo, and he`s currently in prison. Polpo gives Giorno a lit lighter and tells him to make sure that flame doesn`t go out for 24 hours. However while he`s taking the test, Koichi appears before him, looking for his passport.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hei no Naka no Gang ni Ae
Meet the Gangster Behind the Wall
塀の中のギャングに会え

REGULAR.description:
When the lighter was relit, Polpo`s Stand, Shadow Sabbath, appeared and attacked. Giorno is able to see through Shadow Sabbath`s weakness and faces it alongside Koichi. Koichi realizes that the arrow is involved in this situation and they realize that the point of Polpo`s exam is to try to create more Stand users.
Source: crunchyroll

Giorno passes the test to join Passione and meets Bucciarati`s subordinates, Leone Abbacchio, Guido Mista, Narancia Ghirga, and Pannacotta Fugo. After welcoming Giorno into the team, they all head to Capri to retreive Polpo`s hidden fortune. Meanwhile, other members of Passione hear about the fortune and also go to look for it.
Source: crunchyroll

Bucciarati and his gang are attacked by someone`s Stand on their way to Capri. The members start disappearing one after another and then Giorno purposely gets attacked to help find out who exactly is attacking them. Abbacchio still doesn`t trust the newbie, but accepts his resolve and uses his Moody Jazz. He replays what happened to Narancia and then tries to figure out the enemy`s abilities along with Bucciarati.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ムーディー・ブルースの逆襲

REGULAR.description:
Bucciarati is able to defeat Zucchero, a member of Passione who was after Polpo`s fortune and also save his friends. But they find out that Zucchero was in contact with someone else on Capri and was planning to meet up with them, thanks to Moody Jazz`s ability. Mista and Giorno decide to head over to Capri first to try to find Zucchero`s partner and get rid of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セックス・ピストルズ登場 その①

REGULAR.description:
Giorno and Mista arrive at Capri and find Zucchero`s partner, Sale. Mista uses his Stand Six Bullets to fight Sale, but Sale`s Arts & Crafts proves to be a formidable enemy. Mista manages to fight back but then realizes he`s left with only four bullets...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セックス・ピストルズ登場 その②

REGULAR.description:
Bucciarati and his team managed to safely retrieve Polpo`s hidden treasure of 10 billion lire and they are visited by another capo from Passione, Pericolo. Pericolo accepts the 10 billion lire from Bucciarati and immediately gives them an order from the boss. Their mission is to protect the boss`s daughter, Trish Una, from a group of traitors within the organization.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The First Mission from the Boss

REGULAR.description:
Narancia was attacked by Formaggio`s Stand, Tiny Feet, and slowly grows smaller and smaller. But Narancia fights back with his own Stand, Li`l Bomber. While being pursued by Narancia Formaggio looks back on something that the boss had done to the hitman team to send them a message...
Source: crunchyroll

Formaggio uses his Stand, Tiny Feet, to shrink Narancia so he`s only a few centimeters tall and captures him so that he can force him to tell him where the boss`s daughter Trish is. He puts Narancia into a bottle along with a spider and questions him on Trish`s whereabouts. Narancia is determined not to tell Formaggio anything and uses Li`l Bomber to fight back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナランチャのエアロスミス

REGULAR.description:
In order to protect Trish from the Hitman Team, Bucciarati and crew`s second mission from the boss was to go find a key in Pompei for some kind of vehicle that should aid them later on. Following orders, Giorno, Abbacchio, and Fugo head to Pompei to retrieve the key. When they get there, Fugo notices a suspicious shadow reflecting in a mirror that happened to be placed on one of the pillars there...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Second Mission from the Boss

REGULAR.description:
The person hiding in the mirror was Illuso from the Hitman Team. Fugo ends up being dragged into the mirror by Illuso`s Stand, Mirrorman. Fugo then summons his own Stand, Purple Smoke. Despite Giorno wanting to find Fugo, Abbacchio decides to go look for the key, since that was their mission. However, once Abbacchio finds the key, he also gets dragged into the mirror world...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Man in the Mirror to Purple Haze
マン・イン・ザ・ミラーとパープル・ヘイズ

REGULAR.description:
"Take Trish to Venice." With their next order from the boss, Bucciarati and his crew head to Naples Station. "Use the key at the water fountain with the turtle on the 6th platform." They find the water fountain, but can`t find the place to use the key. Meanwhile, Proscuitto and Pesci from the Hitman Team follow Bucciarati and the others to Naples Station. Bucciarati figures out the mystery behind the key and gets on the express train to Florence, and Proscuitto and Pesci follow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フィレンツェ行き超特急

REGULAR.description:
In order to draw out Bucciarati and his crew, who are hiding somewhere on the train, Proscuitto uses his Stand The Thankful Dead`s powers and turns everyone on the train old. Bucciarati and the others were hiding inside the turtle, but they also start to age. Mista goes out to try to fight back, but he`s caught by Pesci`s Stand, Fisher Man.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idai Naru Shi (The Grateful Dead): Sono 1
偉大なる死(ザ・グレイトフル・デッド) その①

REGULAR.description:
Number Six from Six Bullets manages to warn Bucciarati about the enemies and fights back, but The Thankful Death`s powers are taking a toll on him. Bucciarati steels his resolve and throws himself out with Proscuitto out of the train that`s going 150kph. Barely hanging onto life, Proscuitto uses The Thankful Dead again. Pesci decides to take Proscuitto`s resolve to heart and attacks Bucciarati.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idai Naru Shi (The Grateful Dead): Sono 2
偉大なる死(ザ・グレイトフル・デッド) その②

REGULAR.description:
After defeating Proscuitto and Pesci, Bucciarati and the others head to Venice in a car. Melone from the Hitman Team finds some of Bucciarati`s blood at the scene where the train had stopped and then activates Babyhead. The powerful remote-control Stand created by assaulting a woman on the train then goes after Bucciarati.
Source: crunchyroll

Using Babyhead`s Stand`s ability to turn human parts into other things, Giorno uses his Golden Wind to make parts for the human body. He rebuilds his own body and fights back. Meanwhile, another member of the Hitman Team who`s also after Trish, Ghiaccio, was trying to regroup with Melone and was driving to Giorno`s location.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヴェネツィアへ向かえ!

REGULAR.description:
Ghiaccio`s Stand, White Ice is able to envelop him like a bodysuit and able to freeze everything around him to extremely low temperatures. Giorno and Mista somewhat make it to Venice, despite being partially frozen by Ghiaccio. But in order to try to get away from Ghiaccio, Giorno drives their car into the canal and they get stuck. Mista tries to sacrifice himself, but Giorno tells him that what`s important right now isn`t for him to sacrifice himself but for him to have resolve.
Source: crunchyroll

Mista and Giorno were able to defeat Ghiaccio. They then confirm the mission on the disc and head to the location they`re supposed to take Trish. Bucciarati goes up the tower with Trish, but while they`re in the elevator, Trish suddenly disappears. Bucciarati then realizes what the boss`s true motives are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Final Mission from the Boss

REGULAR.description:
Bucciarati finds out that the boss`s true motive is to eliminate Trish because of her relationship with him, causing him to betray the boss and save Trish. Meanwhile, Giorno feels something bizarre is going on as they waited for Bucciarati`s return. The boss`s Stand, Emperor Crimson rises.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キング・クリムゾンの謎

REGULAR.description:
Because of their own wills and their sense of justice, Bucciarati and the others end up betraying the organization. Trish also wants to find out who her father truly is, so she tells the others that her mother met her father in Sardinia. They all decide to have a meal in Venice before they leave and Narancia is suddenly attacked by a Stand. The boss`s own personal elite guard was now on the move.
Source: crunchyroll

The Stand that attacked Narancia was named Crush and belonged to Squallo, a member of the boss`s elite guard. On top of that, Narancia suddenly can only say the exact opposite of what he`s thinking, thanks to the ability of Talking Mouth, the Stand of Squallo`s partner, Tiziano. Using Narancia, Squallo and Tiziano throw the team into chaos. The two elite guard members put Narancia in danger, but he boldly faces them so they can get out of Venice safely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: クラッシュとトーキング・ヘッド

REGULAR.description:
After defeating Squallo and Tiziano, Bucciarati and the others head off to Sardinia to find out about the boss`s past. They head to Marco Polo International Airport in order to get a jet, but a strange man was following them. Mista manages to kill the strange Stand user before they`re able to call upon their Stand. Even though they`re a bit put off at how simple that was, they get onto the jet and fly off. But once they`re on the jet, Giorno hears a weird noise...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ノトーリアスB・I・G[ビッグ]

REGULAR.description:
The man who was killed by Mista at the airport, Carne, was first able to activate his stand, Notorious Chase, after he died. Notorious Chase reacts to movement and it attacks Giorno, resulting in him losing both arms. This makes him unable to use Golden Wind’s abilities, but he gives life to his brooch and recreates his left hand. Trish decides that she’s going to protect that left hand and goes after the brooch, but she’s detected. When all seemed lost, Trish’s Stand, Spicy Lady, was activated.
Source: crunchyroll

The summer of 1965... A woman gave birth to a baby boy inside a women’s prison that sat in the middle of the Adriatic Sea. Bizarrely, she hadn’t been near any man in two years, but somehow got pregnant now. Time passed, and a young man arrived at Sardinia. His name was Doppio. Meanwhile, the leader of the Hitman Team, Risotto, as well as Trish, Bucciarati and the rest of his team all arrive at Sardinia. Doppio encounters Risotto at Costa Smeralda.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Little Story from the Past: My Name Is Doppio
Honno Sukoshi Mukashi no Monogatari: Boku no Na wa Doppio
ほんの少し昔の物語 ~ぼくの名はドッピオ~

REGULAR.description:
Risotto figures out that Doppio must be a Stand user that the boss trusts in deeply because he’s able to hear the noise from a certain Stand. Risotto then uses his Stand Metallic against him. Metallic is able to control magnetic force and attacks Doppio. Doppio uses the part of the boss’s power he received from him. While they’re fighting, Risotto realizes that Doppio’s personality and actions seem to be changing and he realizes exactly who Doppio is.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キング・クリムゾン vs. メタリカ

REGULAR.description:
Doppio is on the brink of death after his fight with Risotto, but he manages to finish him off by having Narancia’s Li’l Bomber attack him. Bucciarati and Narancia go up onto the cliff to find the enemy that Li’l Bomber found and Abbacchio stays on the shore so he can use Moody Jazz to replay who exactly took the photo of Trish’s mother 15 years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beneath a Sky on the Verge of Falling
Ima ni mo Ochite Kitasou na Sora no Shita de
今にも落ちて来そうな空の下で

REGULAR.description:
fter his death, Abbacchio was able to leave the others a copy of the boss’s face and fingerprints with Moody Jazz’s replay. The others try to find out who the boss is with the fingerprint and suddenly get contacted by someone. The mysterious man tells them that the boss’s name is Diavolo and tells them that the secret behind defeating him lies in the arrow. Bucciarati and the others head to Rome to meet him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 目的地はローマ! コロッセオ

REGULAR.description:
Bucciarati and the others end up facing off with 2 assassins sent by the boss, Cioccolata and Secco. Cioccolata uses his Stand Green Tea against them. His Stand creates a mold that makes living creatures rot away and he unleashed it upon the fishing village that Bucciarati and his crew arrived at. Bucciarati and the others manage to evade the attack for the most part and try to keep heading towards the Colosseum, but then Secco also uses his Stand, Sanctuary.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グリーン・ディとオアシス その①

REGULAR.description:
As soon as Ciccolata went up in a helicopter, Green Tea’s ability’s murderous range grew even more. He then flies to Rome and tries to spread his murderous mold. Bucciarati and the others go to stop Ciccolata, but Secco gets in their way. Giorno and Mista go after Ciccolata while Bucciarati faces off with Secco.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グリーン・ディとオアシス その②

REGULAR.description:
After a fierce battle, Giorno and Mista were able to strike down Cioccolata. However, Secco happens to receive one last voicemail from Cioccolata and finds out there’s a secret to defeating the boss at the Colosseum. Secco realizes that Cioccolata probably lost and heads to the Colosseum to find out what this secret is. Bucciarati attacks Secco in order to stop him from getting to the Colosseum, but Secco’s Sanctuary gives him trouble. An intense battle then takes place right in front of the Colosseum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グリーン・ディとオアシス その③

REGULAR.description:
Bucciarati managed to win in his battle against Secco, but his body was reaching its limit. The boss had already arrived in Rome and used Doppio to get closer to Bucciarati. Bucciarati’s condition worsens and he mistakes Doppio as Trish and Doppio plays along. The man with the secret to defeating the boss was waiting for them inside the Colosseum. Time then skips and the boss’s true identity is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: そいつの名はディアボロ

REGULAR.description:
Jean Pierre Polnareff holds the key to defeating the boss. The one who appeared before him wasn’t Bucciarati or his squad, but the leader of Passione, Diavolo himself. Diavolo tries to eliminate Polnareff once and for all and summons Emperor Crimson, but then Polnareff summons Silver Chariot and it is pierced with the arrow. That’s when something happens to everyone in or nearby the Colosseum. They find themselves losing strength and all fall asleep. After waking from their deep sleep, they all realize something has changed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Requiem wa Shizuka ni Kanaderareru: Sono 1
鎮魂歌[レクイエム]は静かに奏でられる その①

REGULAR.description:
After being pierced with the arrow, Silver Chariot becomes Chariot Requiem and goes berserk. As a result, everyone’s minds are switched. Among all the confusion, Polnareff reveals himself to Giorno and the others. If someone with power uses the arrow, they would be able to obtain the power to rule over the minds of all living creatures. Polnareff lets them know that there is more to their Stand’s usual Stand ability if they have access to the arrow. Giorno and crew reunite with Bucciarati and they all go to try to steal the arrow back from Chariot Requiem.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Requiem wa Shizuka ni Kanaderareru: Sono 2
鎮魂歌[レクイエム]は静かに奏でられる その②

REGULAR.description:
Because of Chariot Requiem’s true power, something starts happening to Polnareff’s body. This just makes Bucciarati and the others try to get the arrow back even quicker. But then Giorno states that Diavolo’s mind is possessing one of their bodies. Who will get to the arrow first, Giorno and the rest of the crew or Diavolo? Finally, Diavolo shows himself.
Source: crunchyroll

Diavolo had been possessing Trish’s mind and is able to solve the mystery behind Chariot Requiem, making it possible for him to take the arrow. Giorno and the others attack in order to get the arrow back, but their attacks are futile against Eulogy. The moment that Diavolo tries to pierce his Stand with the arrow, Bucciarati completely destroys Chariot Requiem. Giorno and the others begin their final showdown with the almighty Diavolo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 王の中の王[キング・オブ・キングス]

REGULAR.description:
Giorno takes the arrow that Bucciarati and the others had acquired and stabs Golden Wind with it during the final battle with Diavolo. Golden Wind evolves into Golden Wind Requiem and doesn’t even allow Diavolo to reach the truth of “dying” and he is forced to meet an end that never truly has an end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴールド・E[エクスペリエンス]・レクイエム

REGULAR.description:
Before Giorno had met Bucciarati and the others, a certain florist appeared before Bucciarati. The florist tells him that his daughter had jumped off the roof of an apartment holding a strange looking rock and he wanted to find out the truth behind that bizarre incident. Mista is put in charge of this mission and he goes to track down Scolippi, a sculptor who was the daughter’s boyfriend. Scolippi tells Mista that they are all slaves to destiny, and then a bizarre rock appears in front of them, which tells them Bucciarati’s fate.
Source: crunchyroll

SPECIAL.description:
We take a look back at Giorno`s adventures so far.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Ougon no Kaze - Inizio del Vento Aureo
JoJo`s Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind - Inizio del Vento Aureo
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 黄金の風 Inizio del vento aureo

SPECIAL.description:
We take another look back at the path that led Giorno and the others to where they are now.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Ougon no Kaze - Determinazione
JoJo`s Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind - Determinazione
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 黄金の風 determinazione

SPECIAL.description:
Another look back at the adventures that Giorno and the rest of the crew have had to this point.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Ougon no Kaze - Destino
JoJo`s Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind - Destino
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 黄金の風 destino

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険_(テレビアニメ)

titles.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Ougon no Kaze
JOJO 的奇妙冒險 黃金之風
JOJO的奇妙冒险 黄金之风
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 黄金の風
Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 5: Vântul de Aur
Невероятните приключения на Джо-Джо: Вятър от злато
ההרפתקה המוזרה של ג`וג`ו: רוח מוזהבת
